title: Perform Nodal Analysis
description: A production engineer performs nodal analysis on a well to identify bottlenecks in the production system (from reservoir to separator) and find opportunities to increase flow.

tasks.description: Gather all the required data for the well system, including reservoir pressure, tubing size, and flowline characteristics.
tasks.expected_outcome: All input data for the nodal analysis model is collected.

tasks.description: Build the nodal analysis model, generating the Inflow Performance Relationship (IPR) curve for the reservoir and the Vertical Lift Performance (VLP) curve for the wellbore.
tasks.expected_outcome: The IPR and VLP curves are generated.

tasks.description: Analyze the intersection of the curves to find the well's operating point. Identify that the tubing size is the main restriction. Recommend changing to larger tubing.
tasks.expected_outcome: The analysis identifies a production bottleneck, and a workover to upsize the tubing is recommended.
